p: These findings were confirmed by Solgi et al. (2009), who indicated that the antimicrobial agents such as thymol, carvacrol, zataria oil, and thyme oil in a mixture with 6% sucrose had a significant impact on the shelf- life and relative solution uptake gerbera ( Gerbera jamesonii cv. Dune’) flowers. In another study, Abo Ei-Maati (2016) found that using clove oil has an effective antioxidant and anti-microbial.
